song.title: Jesus We Love You
song.lyrics:
[1] . A Old things have passed away . E2 Your love has stayed the same . A E2 Your constant grace remains the cornerstone || . A Things that we thought were dead . E2 Are breathing in life again . A E2 You cause Your Son to shine on darkest nights
[P] . B For all that Youâ€™ve done . C#m We will pour out our love . A B This will be our anthem song
[C1] .E/G# A E Jesus we love You, Oh how we love You . A E You are the One our, Our hearts adore --- [2] . E A The hopeless have found their hope . E The orphans now have a home . A E Emaj7 All that was lost has found its place in You || .E A You lift our weary head . E You make us strong instead . A E You took these rags and made us beautiful
[C2] .E/G# A E Jesus we love You, Oh how we love You . A E You are the One our, Our hearts adore || .E/G# A E Jesus we love You, Oh how we love You . A C#m B/D# A You are the One our, Our hearts adore || . C#m B/D# A Our hearts adore || . C#m B/D# A Our hearts adore || . C#m B E Our hearts adore ||
[B1] .A Our affection, our devotion .E Poured out on the feet of Jesus
[B2] .F#m Our affection, our devotion .E/G# Poured out on the feet of Jesus
song.presentation: 1 P C1 2 P C2 B1 B1 B2 B1 C1
